creator: paul@andrewscoste.net
text: Use encrypted passwords or the StarTeam Toolbar for SSO for a more secure method of logging on without needing to put unencrypted passwords into your scripts and properties files which are likely then checked back into source control for all to see.
Fixed as part of the patch for Bugs 39926, 46326, 46327, 40995 - Enhanced connectivity and caching.
creator: john@ballment.homeip.net
jkf@apache.org
text:
Not exactly duplicate, but the issue 46326 contains an consolidated patch.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 46326 ***
